snippet: The state has agreed to buy the boyhood home of Lawrence Welk, the maestro of “champagne music” and one of North Dakota’s most famous sons.
abstract: North Dakota has agreed to buy the boyhood home of Lawrence Welk, maestro of 'champagne music' and one of the state's most famous sons.
lead_paragraph: The state has agreed to buy the boyhood home of Lawrence Welk, the maestro of “champagne music” and one of North Dakota’s most famous sons.

headline.main: North Dakota: State Will Buy Lawrence Welk Homestead
headline.print_headline: North Dakota: State Will Buy Lawrence Welk Homestead
